SELECT pro_id , pro_name , pro_status FROM tblProvinces WHERE 1=1 AND pro_status != '9'
AND pro_id = cast(#{proId} as int)

SELECT dis_id , dis_pro_id , dis_name , dis_status FROM tblDistricts WHERE 1=1 AND dis_status != '9'
AND dis_id = cast(#{disId} as int)
AND dis_pro_id = cast(#{disProId} as int)
ORDER BY dis_name

SELECT com_id , com_dis_id , com_name , com_status FROM tblCommunes WHERE 1=1 AND com_status != '9'
AND com_id = cast(#{comId} as int)
AND com_dis_id = cast(#{comDisId} as int)
